message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the conversation with a price of $2000000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $1600000. What do you think?
Thank you for the counteroffer, Alice. I'm still looking to save some money, so I'm willing to go up to $1400000. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $1550000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll find it a great value for the product.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1300000, but no further. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm surprised you're willing to go up to $1300000, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, so I'm counteroffering at $1420000. This is my last chance to get closer to my target price, and I'm hoping you'll consider it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1250000, but no further. Can you meet me at this price?
